name: Yellow Face - An Asian American Story
name_original: Yellow Face - An Asian American Story
description:
An interactive game about being Asian in America. Based on a true story. 

Supports Mobile Devices, please play in landscape mode. 

How to Play: 

  • Select the Text Buttons to respond.
  • Try to survive being Asian.  

Project inspired by "YELLOW FACE" written by David Henry Hwang. 

Feel free to share this game with the following link: 

https://mikeyren.itch.io/yellowface
